title: Network-Based Language Learning and Collective Intelligence Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Emphasizing networked learning design competencies applicable to language education settings for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning activities leveraging collective intelligence in a MOOC environment.
Learners can explain strategies for forming and operating network-based small-scale learning communities.
Learners can evaluate language education tools that promote social interaction in asynchronous online environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
